feed.title: cpprefjp - C++日本語リファレンス

entry.title: logic_error -- logic_error : コンパイルエラーを修正
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/stdexcept/logic_error.md b/reference/stdexcept/logic_error.md
index fd4063680..f63d0f109 100644
--- a/reference/stdexcept/logic_error.md
+++ b/reference/stdexcept/logic_error.md
@@ -31,7 +31,7 @@ namespace std {
 
 int square_root(int num) {
   if (num < 0) {
-    throw std::invalid_argument("Cannot perform calculations with negative numbers!")
+    throw std::invalid_argument("Cannot perform calculations with negative numbers!");
   }
   return num * num;
 }
